thread.title: China Encroaches on India’s Sphere of Influence

author: Sadanand Dhume
title: China Encroaches on India’s Sphere of Influence
text:
Is India still top dog in its neighborhood? This is the question raised by a political crisis in the Maldives, an Indian Ocean island chain known for its luxury beach resorts. Unless New Delhi swiftly restores democracy, it risks looking ineffectual in the face of Chinese inroads into India’s traditional zone of influence.

The crisis began earlier this month, when President Abdulla Yameen’s government declared a state of emergency and arrested two Supreme Court judges as well as a long-serving former president who is Mr. Yameen’s...
